short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that uses PromptAPI and vector embeddings to help users quickly find answers about the current website's content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask my website is a chrome extension that uses the PromptAPI together with vector embeddings to provide an assistant to easily get answers about the content of the current website.
